name: Online Shop
description: My first full-stack application which was developed as a final degree app for The Web-Developer course. This project was build with the following technologies: React, Redux, Express, PostgreSQL, TyoeORM, TypeScript.

name: Vikdrums
description: This web-site was developed for students of a music school who learn how to play drums. The main idea of this project is to provide access to the charts, audio and video materials from anywhere. This practic can help students to understand the subject better and to get familiar with information that was provided during the lesson.

name: Figure Skating Coach
description: Portfolio project for the figure skating coach. This is a landing page with three pages where customers can find helpful information for themselfs. Application is created with React.js
